alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 6:31PM CDT until August 04 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Brown County in north central Nebraska... Northern Blaine County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Thomas County in north central Nebraska... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Purdum, or 19 miles northwest of Brewster, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Purdum, Hawley Flats and Koshopah. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
